verses.kjv: Then came certain of the elders of Israel unto me, and sat before me.
verses.web: Then some of the elders of Israel came to me, and sat before me.
verses.ct: One day, some of the elders of Israel came to me and sat down in front of me.

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: Then the word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, these men have set up their idols in their heart, and put the stumblingblock of their iniquity before their face: should I be enquired of at all by them?
verses.web: “Son of man, these men have taken their idols into their heart, and put the stumbling block of their iniquity before their face. Should I be inquired of at all by them?
verses.ct: "Son of man, these men have set up idols in their hearts and placed the sin that causes them to stumble right in front of their faces. Why should I let them come to me for answers?"

verses.kjv: Therefore speak unto them, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Every man of the house of Israel that setteth up his idols in his heart, and putteth the stumblingblock of his iniquity before his face, and cometh to the prophet; I the LORD will answer him that cometh according to the multitude of his idols;
verses.web: Therefore speak to them, and tell them, ‘The Lord LORD says: “Every man of the house of Israel who takes his idols into his heart, and puts the stumbling block of his iniquity before his face, and comes to the prophet; I LORD will answer him therein according to the multitude of his idols;
verses.ct: "So speak to them and tell them, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: Any person in Israel who sets up idols in his heart and puts the sin that causes him to stumble right in front of his face, and then comes to a prophet — I, the LORD, will answer that person according to the number of idols he worships.

verses.kjv: That I may take the house of Israel in their own heart, because they are all estranged from me through their idols.
verses.web: that I may take the house of Israel in their own heart, because they are all estranged from me through their idols.” ’
verses.ct: I will do this to grip the hearts of the people of Israel, because they have all turned away from me through their idols.'"

verses.kjv: Therefore say unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Repent, and turn yourselves from your idols; and turn away your faces from all your abominations.
verses.web: “Therefore tell the house of Israel, ‘The Lord LORD says: “Return, and turn yourselves from your idols! Turn away your faces from all your abominations.
verses.ct: "So tell the people of Israel, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: Repent! Turn away from your idols and reject all your disgusting practices.

verses.kjv: For every one of the house of Israel, or of the stranger that sojourneth in Israel, which separateth himself from me, and setteth up his idols in his heart, and putteth the stumblingblock of his iniquity before his face, and cometh to a prophet to enquire of him concerning me; I the LORD will answer him by myself:
verses.web: “ ‘ “For everyone of the house of Israel, or of the strangers who live in Israel, who separates himself from me, and takes his idols into his heart, and puts the stumbling block of his iniquity before his face, and comes to the prophet to inquire for himself of me; I LORD will answer him by myself.
verses.ct: Anyone in Israel — or any foreigner living among them — who cuts himself off from me, sets up idols in his heart, puts the sin that causes him to stumble right in front of his face, and then goes to a prophet to ask me for guidance — I, the LORD, will answer that person myself.

verses.kjv: And I will set my face against that man, and will make him a sign and a proverb, and I will cut him off from the midst of my people; and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: I will set my face against that man, and will make him an astonishment, for a sign and a proverb, and I will cut him off from among my people. Then you will know that I am LORD.
verses.ct: I will turn against that person and make him a horrifying example, a warning everyone talks about. I will cut him off from my people. Then you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: And if the prophet be deceived when he hath spoken a thing, I the LORD have deceived that prophet, and I will stretch out my hand upon him, and will destroy him from the midst of my people Israel.
verses.web: “ ‘ “If the prophet is deceived and speaks a word, I, LORD, have deceived that prophet, and I will stretch out my hand on him, and will destroy him from among my people Israel.
verses.ct: And if a prophet is fooled into giving a message, it is I, the LORD, who allowed that prophet to be deceived. I will raise my hand against him and destroy him from among my people Israel.

verses.kjv: And they shall bear the punishment of their iniquity: the punishment of the prophet shall be even as the punishment of him that seeketh unto him;
verses.web: They will bear their iniquity. The iniquity of the prophet will be even as the iniquity of him who seeks him;
verses.ct: Both will bear the punishment for their sin — the prophet's guilt will be the same as the guilt of the person who came seeking answers.

verses.kjv: That the house of Israel may go no more astray from me, neither be polluted any more with all their transgressions; but that they may be my people, and I may be their God, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: that the house of Israel may no more go astray from me, neither defile themselves any more with all their transgressions; but that they may be my people, and I may be their God,” says the Lord LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: The purpose of all this is so that the people of Israel will never again wander away from me or defile themselves with their sins. Instead, they will be my people, and I will be their God," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: The word of the LORD came again to me, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me again:

verses.kjv: Son of man, when the land sinneth against me by trespassing grievously, then will I stretch out mine hand upon it, and will break the staff of the bread thereof, and will send famine upon it, and will cut off man and beast from it:
verses.web: “Son of man, when a land sins against me by committing a trespass, and I stretch out my hand on it, and break the staff of its bread, and send famine on it, and cut off from it man and animal;
verses.ct: "Son of man, suppose a nation sins against me by being deeply unfaithful. I stretch out my hand against it, cut off its food supply, send famine across the land, and wipe out both people and animals.

verses.kjv: Though these three men, Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, they should deliver but their own souls by their righteousness, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: though these three men, Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, they would deliver only their own souls by their righteousness,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: Even if Noah, Daniel, and Job were living in that land, their righteousness would save only their own souls — no one else," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: If I cause noisome beasts to pass through the land, and they spoil it, so that it be desolate, that no man may pass through because of the beasts:
verses.web: “If I cause evil animals to pass through the land, and they ravage it, and it is made desolate, so that no man may pass through because of the animals;
verses.ct: "Or suppose I send dangerous wild animals through the land, and they ravage it until it becomes so desolate that no one dares travel through it because of the beasts.

verses.kjv: Though these three men were in it, as I live, saith the Lord GOD, they shall deliver neither sons nor daughters; they only shall be delivered, but the land shall be desolate.
verses.web: though these three men were in it, as I live,” says the Lord LORD, “they would deliver neither sons nor daughters. They only would be delivered, but the land would be desolate.
verses.ct: As surely as I live," declares the Lord GOD, "even if those 3 men were in that land, they could not save their own sons or daughters. Only they themselves would be rescued, and the land would still be left desolate.

verses.kjv: Or if I bring a sword upon that land, and say, Sword, go through the land; so that I cut off man and beast from it:
verses.web: “Or if I bring a sword on that land, and say, ‘Sword, go through the land; so that I cut off from it man and animal;’
verses.ct: "Or suppose I bring war against that land and command the sword, 'Cut through this land!' — wiping out both people and animals.

verses.kjv: Though these three men were in it, as I live, saith the Lord GOD, they shall deliver neither sons nor daughters, but they only shall be delivered themselves.
verses.web: though these three men were in it, as I live,” says the Lord LORD, “they would deliver neither sons nor daughters, but they only would be delivered themselves.
verses.ct: As surely as I live," declares the Lord GOD, "even if those 3 men were in it, they could not save their sons or daughters. Only they themselves would be rescued.

verses.kjv: Or if I send a pestilence into that land, and pour out my fury upon it in blood, to cut off from it man and beast:
verses.web: “Or if I send a pestilence into that land, and pour out my wrath on it in blood, to cut off from it man and animal;
verses.ct: "Or suppose I send a plague into that land and pour out my fury on it with bloodshed, cutting off both people and animals.

verses.kjv: Though Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, as I live, saith the Lord GOD, they shall deliver neither son nor daughter; they shall but deliver their own souls by their righteousness.
verses.web: though Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, as I live,” says the Lord LORD, “they would deliver neither son nor daughter; they would deliver only their own souls by their righteousness.”
verses.ct: As surely as I live," declares the Lord GOD, "even if Noah, Daniel, and Job were there, they could not save a single son or daughter. Their righteousness would rescue only their own souls."

verses.kjv: For thus saith the Lord GOD; How much more when I send my four sore judgments upon Jerusalem, the sword, and the famine, and the noisome beast, and the pestilence, to cut off from it man and beast?
verses.web: For the Lord LORD says: “How much more when I send my four severe judgments on Jerusalem, the sword, the famine, the evil animals, and the pestilence, to cut off from it man and animal!
verses.ct: Then the Lord GOD says: "How much worse will it be when I send all 4 of my devastating judgments against Jerusalem at once — war, famine, wild beasts, and plague — to wipe out both people and animals?

verses.kjv: Yet, behold, therein shall be left a remnant that shall be brought forth, both sons and daughters: behold, they shall come forth unto you, and ye shall see their way and their doings: and ye shall be comforted concerning the evil that I have brought upon Jerusalem, even concerning all that I have brought upon it.
verses.web: Yet, behold, there will be left a remnant in it that will be carried out, both sons and daughters. Behold, they will come out to you, and you will see their way and their doings. Then you will be comforted concerning the evil that I have brought on Jerusalem, even concerning all that I have brought on it.
verses.ct: Yet even so, a remnant will survive — sons and daughters who will be brought out of the city. When they come to you and you see how they lived and what they did, you will understand why I brought this disaster on Jerusalem — every bit of it.

verses.kjv: And they shall comfort you, when ye see their ways and their doings: and ye shall know that I have not done without cause all that I have done in it, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: They will comfort you, when you see their way and their doings; then you will know that I have not done all that I have done in it without cause,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: Their behavior will actually bring you a strange comfort, because when you see how they lived, you will realize that everything I did to Jerusalem was not without reason," declares the Lord GOD.
